Package org.world.agents.player.melee

Class ComboNode

java.lang.Object
org.world.agents.player.melee.ComboNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackNode, DodgeNode, IdleNode
public abstract class ComboNode
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements a basic node class for the ComboGraph object. These notes implement states in the finite state machine represented by the ComboGraph. Each node holds various information about the player, weapon and the action being performed

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int baseDuration
    Holds the regular duration of this state.
    (package private) boolean canDodge
    Marks whether the player can dodge from this move
    (package private) boolean canMove
    Marks whether the player is able to move in this state
    boolean canThrowStabbedEnemy
    Some moves can stab an enemy, allowing the player to pick them up, move them around and throw them
    int comboWindow
    Time (in 1/60ths of a second) at the end of the state in which input is polled and the next state is decided Set to 0 if a forced transition (independent of player input) is desired
    (package private) ComboNode Dodge
    Links to possible moves
    (package private) ComboNode DrawSheath
    Links to possible moves
    int duration
    Actual duration Computed state duration based on the attack speed
    (package private) boolean finished
    Marks node as finished for the ComboGraph
    (package private) SoundClip finishEffect
    Sound effect playing when the comboWindow begins
    protected ComboGraph graph
    Reference to the combo graph associated with this
    (package private) ComboNode Heavy
    Links to possible moves
    (package private) ComboNode Light
    Links to possible moves

    Links to possible moves
    int playerAnimation
    Animation index for the player character

    Links to possible moves

    Stamina used to perform current state's action

  • Constructor Details

    • ComboNode

      public ComboNode​(ComboGraph combo, int weaponAnimation, int playerAnimation, int xOffset, int yOffset, int duration, int comboWindow, int staminaCost, boolean canThrow, boolean canDodge, boolean canMove, java.lang.String startSoundPath, java.lang.String finishSoundPath)
      Creates a new combo node with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      combo - reference to the ComboGraph object containing then node
      weaponAnimation - index of the weapon animation associated with this node
      playerAnimation - index of the player animation associated with this node
      canDodge - whether the player can dodge at the end fo this state
      canMove - whether the player can move during this state
      canThrow - whether the player can throw an enemy in this state
      xOffset - horizontal offset of the weapon relative to the player
      yOffset - vertical offset of the camera relative to the player
      duration - duration of the state
      comboWindow - time at the end of the state during which input is polled for deciding the next state
      finishSoundPath - string containing the path to the sound file, can be null
      startSoundPath - string containing the path to the sound file, can be null
      staminaCost - amount of stamina that the player should use to perform this attack
